ai-patthana17.22:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.22:0.3_0: he used to perform the remaining cloth.
ai-patthana17.22:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the reason why the skillful teaching arises when it comes to skillful qualities.
ai-patthana17.22:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana17.22:3.1_0: Neither has not been declared by the result of deeds.
